fields.inlineHelpText: This stores asynchronous job Id if any jobs running on this opportunity.
fields.label: Async Job

fields.inlineHelpText: This stores the asynchronous operation name for which this opportunity is locked.

fields.label: Effective Total: Base One Time Charges

fields.inlineHelpText: This indicates if an opportunity is locked by a user.
fields.label: Locked By User

fields.inlineHelpText: This stores the reason for doing lock on the opportunity.
fields.label: Locked For
fields.name: vlocity_cmt__LockedFor__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If an opportunity has been validated, it will show the status Passed or Failed. If no validation has been run yet, it will show Not yet run.
fields.label: Validation Status
fields.name: vlocity_cmt__ValidationStatus__c
